result.execSummary:
The defendant Matrivee T Edwards was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Retail Theft - Intentionally Take >$500 - $5000) [Modifiers: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime], a class I felony, Wisconsin Statutes 943.50(1m)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Straight time, if imposed. If revoked, 9 days credit granted. STAYED for probation.
Probation may be transferred to Milwaukee County. The Court will allow for early termination after 1 year if the agent deems it appropriate.

miscConds.notes:
Restitution to be determined at a future hearing. Cash bond on file held pending outcome of restitution hearing.
12/01/2021 PER STIPULATION FILED, RESTITUTION FOR TARGET TO BE PAID AS A CONDITION OF PROBATION. CASH BAILL APPLIED.
Costs to be paid as a condition of probation.

Follow through with any assessments, evaluations, treatment and/or counseling recommended by Agent.
Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided, immediately if in custody otherwise within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.
If probation is revoked and a prison term is not ordered, or if probation is discharged/terminated, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant and in favor of restitution victims and government entities for outstanding financial obligations.  Collection may include income assignment.

timeConds.notes: With Huber, STAYED to be used at the Agent's discretion.

Michele W. Hulgaard appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

Defense makes sentencing recommendations.

COUNT 2
Court orders the following:
9 MONTHS JAIL

Court will allow early termination after 1-year if the agent deems it appropriate.

*Cash Bail in the amount of $200.00 is to be applied to restitution/costs/surcharge*
